pageContent: Objective: To morphometrically compare local atherosclerotic changes in cancerous prostate with those in noncancerous prostate specimens, as epidemiological studies report a positive association between the prevalence of general atherosclerosis and prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Prostate cancer stem cells, telomerase biology, epigenetic modifiers, and molecular systemic therapy for the androgen-independent lethal phenotype
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16520275/
